summary: Just a shield version of a Parasol. Torch version coming soon.
descriptionHtml:
Lavender & Lace Mod on hold for a while. I currently have no time to commit to it as much as I want to. But I will continue to plug away at it.

Version 1.2 (Upcoming Update)
-Torch version of the Parasol. Still can\'t figure out why the alpha property is not working properly. Very vexing.

New Parasol 1.1 now available.
The new Parasol is found in Breezehome. In the default chest, upstairs in your bedroom.

Please uninstall Parasol 1.0 before installing the new one.

Currently working on the torch version of the Parasol. Coming along okay, however having some issues with the alpha properties not working correctly. Once complete however, the Parasol will come in two flavors; Light emitting and non-light emitting. As well they will be found in a new location and with some Lace Gloves. As well as some other additions that suit this mod from other authors.

Change Log 1.1
==============
-Added proper collision mesh.
-Changed mesh and texture paths for upcoming Lavender and Lace Mod.
author: Voivod333

files.name: Parasol_1-1
files.changelogHtml:
-Added proper collision mesh.
-Changed paths for meshes and textures for future \"Lavender and Lace\" additions.
